PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 18 It was found that the NT - based polymers exhibited distinctly improved photovoltaic performances relative to the BT counterparts , which can be attributed to the enhanced carrier mobility and reduced the band gaps.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| carrier mobility |
| reduced band gaps |
| NT-based polymers |
| BT counterparts |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| carrier mobility |
| reduced band gaps |
| NT-based polymers |
| BT-based polymers |

Note: I assumed that "NT" and "BT" refer to different types of polymers, so I kept both "NT-based polymers" and "BT-counterparts" as separate entities. If "NT" and "BT" are just abbreviations for the same type of polymer with different modifications, then only "carrier mobility" and "reduced band gaps" should be kept as entities.
